409210.name: Terraria: Official Soundtrack
409210.description:
The complete and definitive soundtrack for the hit Indie 2D Adventure-Sandbox game Terraria!

Featuring 74 songs (nearly two and a half full hours of amazing music!) from the PC version of the game - all composed & produced by Scott Lloyd Shelly/Resonance Array - the Terraria Official Soundtrack will provide the perfect background music for your Terrarian adventures - or your every day ones!

Track List - All Songs are in MP3 Format
